entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v2.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore: update nx to 18 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1366
  • chore: update to nx 19 by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1385
  • feat: update to gpt4o for selfhost OCR by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1387
  • fix: cors allowlist app-specific subdomains by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1390

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v2.14.1...v2.14.2
